name: .PSDC
summary: Learn about .PSDC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a PSDC file with Adobe Photoshop (multiplatform). To open a PSDC file saved in your Adobe Cloud account with Photoshop, select File → Open..., click Open cloud documents, and choose the PSDC file.

The PSDC file format supports incremental backup and restore. To view the version history of your Adobe cloud PSDC document, select File → Version History (versions expire after 30 days unless you mark them for preservation).
You can also sign in to Adobe Assets Web with your Adobe account, then select Files → Cloud documents, choose a PSDC file, and click Timeline to view all the saved versions of the document.
Adobe Photoshop can convert PSDC files to many file types, including the following formats:
